channel.title: [-HELP-]-[-REP++-]-Low Detail in 317
channel.description:
how do i set so when someone connects to my server, they are on low detail..?
right now when they connect its on high detail but u can switch to low...
is it possible to make em connect with low and if they want they can switch to high?

item.title: [-HELP-]-[-REP++-]-Low Detail in 317
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

[quote=“liamlod2008, post:2, topic:274726”]Uhhmmm did you use bluurrs If you did you have to change it yourself
Uhh you open client then it will say something like details

Type high/Low

Rep me :D[/quote]

no i didn’t use bluurrs, and where in my client shall i look for “detail high low”, if its in Gui.java then u gotta explain how i do it in there
